title: 14,000 MS
body:
I have been experiencing major lag issues in my games recently, and it's really starting to get in my nerves. 
  
    At first i thought i was my internet provider, but I looked at my connection in Discord, that being 56 ms. Then I look at my in game MS and it's usually over 5000. Is the an issue with the servers and my connection to them or is it me?

replies.body:
Each server or service (such as Discord, Netflix, YouTube, League) are all located in different physical locations, and your connection takes different network routing to them. High spikes and changes in latency (ms) are often caused by poor routing to that specific server. Sometimes a number of local network settings can also affect your latency, so I recommend working through our basic [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if the steps in that guide caused any change.
